Networking

Class Networking

  • java.lang.Object
    • Networking.Networking
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Networking
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable

    Enables local network communication with moderator.

    The communication protocol is described in documentation of CommonLib (see edu.cvut.vorobvla.bap.BapMessages).

    This class is implemented as a singleton.

        public void startNetworkingListener()
        If state is NetworkState.WAITING_FOR_CALL starts networkListener otherwise does nothing.

      • isBroadcast

        public boolean isBroadcast()
        If broadcast is enabled.
        Returns:
        value of broadcast

      • recvGameInfo

        public JSONObject recvGameInfo()
        Receives data via UDP (calling recvUDP()) and parses it to JSONObject. Gets from this JSONObject information about time of sending (with key edu.cvut.vorobvla.bap.BapJSONKeys#KEY_BROADCAST_TIMESTAMP). If the data is up-to-date (time of sending is greater then broadcastLatestTimestamp) sets broadcastLatestTimestamp to the time of sending and returns the parsed JSONObject. Otherwise returns null
        Returns:
        JSONObject with game info normally, null if the information is invalid (ParseException occurs) or not up-to-date.

      • sendMsg

        public void sendMsg(java.lang.String msg)
        Sends message with specified content to moderator with TCP protocol.
        Parameters:
        msg - desired message to send.
